info.title: Bakery Store API Documentation
info.description: API documentation for Bakery Store E-commerce Platform. This API provides endpoints for managing products, orders, carts, customers, and more.

post.description: Register a new user with email, password, and Firebase UID
Generate and send OTP to the provided phone number

mobile_no.description: Phone number registered in the system

post.description: Authenticate user using OTP sent to phone number
Authenticate user using email and password
Login for both admin and regular users with Firebase authentication. Admin users will use custom token, regular users will use email/password Firebase auth.

auth_method.description: Authentication method used: 'custom_token' for admin, 'password' for regular user

post.description: Logout the authenticated user and invalidate all tokens
Generate new access and refresh tokens using a valid refresh token
Check if a user with the given Firebase UID exists in the system

post.summary: Get Firebase custom token for admin users
post.description: Generate a new Firebase custom token for admin users. This token can be exchanged for an ID token via Firebase Authentication API.

firebase_uid.description: Firebase UID of the admin user

custom_token.description: Firebase custom token that can be exchanged for ID token

401.description: Unauthorized - User not found or not admin

post.summary: [Proxy] Firebase: Exchange Custom Token for ID Token
post.description: **Backend proxy to Firebase API.** Exchange the custom token (from /api/auth/getCustomToken) for a Firebase ID token. The backend forwards your request to Firebase: `https://identitytoolkit.googleapis.com/v1/accounts:signInWithCustomToken`. You can test this directly in Swagger UI.

idToken.description: Use this as Bearer token for API calls

post.summary: [Proxy] Firebase: Sign In with Email & Password
post.description: **Backend proxy to Firebase API.** Sign in with email/password to get Firebase ID token. The backend forwards your request to Firebase: `https://identitytoolkit.googleapis.com/v1/accounts:signInWithPassword`. You can test this directly in Swagger UI.

idToken.description: Use this as Bearer token for API calls

get.description: Get all categories visible to customers
Get all categories including hidden ones for admin panel
Get all provinces from GHN API for shipping address
Get districts by province ID from GHN API
Get wards by district ID from GHN API
Calculate shipping fee from GHN based on destination

post.description: Finalize order with shipping details, payment method, and vouchers. Requires Firebase authentication.

403.description: Forbidden - Order does not belong to customer

post.summary: Mark order as received by customer
post.description: Customer marks order as completed/delivered. Requires Firebase authentication.

403.description: Forbidden - Order does not belong to customer

post.summary: Give feedback and rating for completed order
post.description: Customer provides rating (1-5 stars) and feedback for their order. Requires Firebase authentication.

403.description: Forbidden - Order does not belong to customer

post.description: Add a product with optional toppings to one or multiple shopping carts

order_ids.description: Array of order IDs to add product to

get.description: Get all draft orders (carts) with their items for the authenticated customer

post.description: Customer cancels their order. Requires Firebase authentication.

403.description: Forbidden - Order does not belong to customer

post.description: Update the status of an order. Requires Firebase authentication.
Create a payment link for order using PayOS

get.description: Get all products with categories for admin panel
Get all active products with categories for customer view
Get detailed information of a specific product including toppings and sizes
